The 2002 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards () (or simply 2002 Multishow Awards) (Portuguese: Prêmio Multishow 2002) was held on 5 June 2002, at the Theatro Municipal in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Nelson Motta and Fernanda Torres hosted the ceremony for the third consecutive time.
Winners and nominees
Nominees for each award are listed below; winners are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
